gui.mp.designer.title: Mad Particle Command Designer
gui.mp.de.mode.title: Options
gui.mp.de.helper.tip.left: Adjust scene/preview settings on the left.
gui.mp.de.helper.tip.mid: Scroll to zoom. Left-click empty space to control view, right-click to unlock.
gui.mp.de.helper.tip.bottom: Click an image to apply a particle material. If R/G/B exceeds 1, rendering may differ in-game.
gui.mp.de.helper.tip.right: Enter particle command parameters on the right.
gui.mp.de.helper.preview_fail_fps: Preview pauses if FPS drops below 30.
gui.mp.de.helper.x_diffuse.tooltip: Spawn Position Error on X Axis
gui.mp.de.helper.y_diffuse.tooltip: Spawn Position Error on Y Axis
gui.mp.de.helper.z_diffuse.tooltip: Spawn Position Error on Z Axis
gui.mp.de.helper.vx_diffuse.tooltip: Spawn Speed Error on X Axis
gui.mp.de.helper.vy_diffuse.tooltip: Spawn Speed Error on Y Axis
gui.mp.de.helper.vz_diffuse.tooltip: Spawn Speed Error on Z Axis
gui.mp.de.helper.horizontal_diffuse.tool: Horizontal Spread Factor when Collied with Blocks
gui.mp.de.helper.vertical_bounce.tooltip: Vertical Bounce Factor when Collied with Blocks
gui.mp.de.helper.horizontal_interact.too: Horizontal Interaction Factor when Interact with Players
gui.mp.de.helper.vertical_interact.toolt: Vertical Interaction Factor when Interact with Players
gui.mp.de.helper.x_deflection.tooltip: Constant Deflect force on X Axis
gui.mp.de.helper.x_deflection_after.tool: Constant Deflect force on X Axis After 1st Collision
gui.mp.de.helper.z_deflection.tooltip: Constant Deflect force on Z Axis
gui.mp.de.helper.z_deflection_after.tool: Constant Deflect force on Z Axis After 1st Collision
gui.mp.de.helper.meta.title: Meta Parameters
§6Every Option has its own flaws.§r
Vanilla method.
Suitable for scenes with a majority of opaque particles.
§7Performance impact：§b●

§6Every Option has its own flaws.§r
Simply mixing, but can fool your eyes.
Suitable for scenes with a majority of the same translucent particles.
§7Performance impact：§b●

§6Every Option has its own flaws.§r
Not precisely accurate, but generally applicable.
§6May stress the GPU.§r
§7性能影响：§a●●
gui.mp.de.setting.amount.tooltip: Specify max amount of particles (each rendering type can accommodate).
gui.mp.de.setting.real_force.tooltip:
true: Always cancels the spawning of all particles beyond twice the viewing distance.
§7Performance impact：§b●
gui.mp.de.setting.threads.tooltip:
Recommend to choose a value equal to CPU cores.
Larger values can improve performance, but may affect the operation of other programs.
§6Recommend to restart the game.
§7If necessary, you can change this value in .minecraft/config/MadParticleConfig.json.
§7Performance impact：§c●●●●●
gui.mp.de.setting.additional.takeover_re:
Make most particles of the vanilla game and/or other Mods use instanced rendering.
§6Taking over particle rendering from other Mods may lead to errors.
§7Performance impact：§e●●●
gui.mp.de.setting.additional.takeover_ti:
Parallelize ticking particles of the vanilla game and/or other Mods.
§6Taking over particle computation from other Mods may lead to errors.
§7Performance impact：§e●●●
gui.mp.de.setting.light.hor.tooltip:
Set the X/Z radius of Light Cache.
Larger values improve performance but also consume more RAM.
§cNeed to restart the game.
§7Performance impact：§a●●
gui.mp.de.setting.light.ver.tooltip:
Set the Y radius of Light Cache.
Larger values improve performance but also consume more RAM.
§cNeed to restart the game.
§7Performance impact：§a●●
gui.mp.de.setting.light.force.tooltip:
true：All particles will render with max light (15), faster.
§7Performance impact：§c●●●●●
gui.mp.de.setting.light.update.tooltip:
Set the light cache refresh interval.
Higher frequency is suitable for high speed movement, but also consumes more performance.
§7Performance impact：§6●●●●
gui.mp.wel.title: Welcome
gui.mp.wel.text1:
Welcome to MadParticle!
Press §b%s§r to open MadParticle Designer GUI and write your first command.
gui.mp.wel.text2: You can read the full guideline at
item.madparticle.tada.tip: Press [§lshift§r] to copy the command inside to clipboard
